topic.title: is 08chan down for everyone?
topic.body: Or is it just me? I keep getting a malformed database error

1565801544_1A3LTcwaXGFQJb7KDN4rbgYzNFQdA.body:
Server error
Err: DatabaseError: database disk image is malformed in UiServer.py line 103 > UiRequest.py line 152 > UiConfigPlugin.py line 21 > ContentFilterPlugin.py line 216 > UiRequest.py line 358 > SiteManagerPlugin.py line 65 > SiteManager.py line 150 > Site.py line 54 > OptionalManagerPlugin.py line 61 > ContentManager.py line 34 > ContentDbDict.py line 18 > ContentDb.py line 112 > Db.py line 75 > DbCursor.py line 82

> [pexo](#comment_127_1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC): Do you get an white screen with just that error or is it some popup error?The popup thing should be fixed with the rebuild that @ayra mentioned. If not, you likely need to backup your users.json, take note of what zites you currently have, shutdown ZeroNet, delete your ZeroNet-data folder, restart ZeroNet, shut it down again, swap the new users.json with your old one and finally start ZeroNet again. This, in general, will solve most of the issues you may run into. Alternatively you can add db_mode = security in your zeronet.conf file to lower the chances of that happening again.

thank you, bby. I pretty much wanted to know whether I should reinstall or not.

1565811747_1aaGBN84Cc8VE7iocUxPXiRVhx9qS.body:
> [wejehteman2](#comment_14_1GYTFEyxLQK2TdsHvXUknoqfV3f8xdxR6P): The Nazis had 3 components. Socialism, Nationalism, and White Supremacy. Modern alt right only has one of those three. The modern alt right is made up of Nationalism and White Advocacy. Which is actually pretty open ended. In that way I would say Nazis fall into the category alt right but being alt right doesn't make you a Nazi at all. It's like saying Hitler is a human but being a human doesn't make you Hitler.

The nazis wern't socialists.

This is historical revisionism; The night of the long knifes was carried out against the actual socialist (those who wish to establish a society based on democratic control of production) wing of the Nazi party.
Furthermore, Hitler was famous for decrying Communism as a Jewish conspiracy.
He was also famous for his repression of the German socialists and violently destroying unions in Germany.

He even gave massive hand outs to American corporations in Germany.
And even went as far as privatizing key industries like the rail industry.

The word privatization was coined because of The Nazi Party.
Lies, lies, lies,

The "alt-right" as you put them are defiantly either: A. Neo Nazis outright, such as the case of 8ch/pol/, or are closeted Nazis; E.G they wont really call them self nazis or racists but they will claim that they are "National identitiarians" or whatever other nonsense.

The fact of the matter is conservatives hold many veiws and opinions nazis take a liking too. (If you can't beat em join em after all.)

So conservatives are really just being manipulated by the reich wing.

> [nvhgfd7856f8]

Socialists up to that point in history had recognized socialism as collective and democratic ownership of the means of production by the working class. A chicken hawk can dress up like a duck all it wants and it still will never be a duck. Regardless of what you say they wern't socialists, have never been socialists, and will enver be socialists.

You have no understanding of history. Working class movements all over the world at this point in time viewed socialism as I just defined it. The only reason hitler took up the name of socialism was to influence radicals at the time who probably didn't know better.

ITT: dumb fucking Nazis

1565969602_112M71AbhUCyq3M7k8PLDRdELuQKG.body:
Prostitution cannot exist under communism. Prostitution is an exchange for money. Under communism commodity barriers are broken down and the means of production become collectively owned by the community; Meaning that there is no hoarding of resources that leads to exchange as a necessary general rule of the economy.

Everything is produced for its immediate use and consumption. Prostitution wouldn't exist because exchange and money would no longer exist.

And from the perspective of the cattle it won't matter if the butcher ends up being true free men claiming what they can or the kikes that promised you a communist utopia which ends up in Babylon 2.0 and an overproduction of slaves that need culling once in a while.
